topic: Arrest of Coast Guardsman's wife by federal immigration authorities
claims: The spouse is not a member of the Coast Guard and was detained by Homeland Security Investigations.
The woman's work visa expired around 2017 and she was marked for removal from the United States a few years later.
The couple was preparing to move into on-base housing when the woman's name was flagged during a routine security check.
intent: To report on the arrest of a military spouse by immigration authorities and the circumstances surrounding it.
